repository.note: CRAN packages are hosted on the Comprehensive R Archive Network

name_definition.note: The name is the package name and is case sensitive, but there cannot be two packages on CRAN with the same name ignoring case.

version_definition.note: The version is the package version.

steps.question: Is there a namespace component?
steps.yes: Invalid PURL - namespace is prohibited for cran

steps.question: Is there a name component?
steps.no: Invalid PURL - name is required for cran

steps.question: Is there a version component?
steps.no: Invalid PURL - version is required for cran

context.naming_convention: Case-sensitive package names but unique case-insensitive

edge_cases.handling: Package names are case-sensitive but CRAN enforces uniqueness ignoring case

edge_cases.handling: Versions can contain hyphens to represent patch levels
edge_cases.purl_impact: Hyphens in versions are preserved exactly as specified
